SELECT NAME CODE_NAME, NAME CODE_NAME FROM SYS0035M WHERE STUS_CODE_ID = 1
AND CNTY_ID = #{groupCode}

SELECT area_name CODE_NAME, area_name CODE_NAME FROM SYS0039M WHERE AREA_STUS_ID = 1 GROUP BY AREA_NAME ORDER BY AREA_NAME
AND AREA_STATE_ID = #{groupCode}

SELECT INSTALL_ID , ORD_ID , INST_ADDR_DTL , INST_STREET , INST_AREA , INST_POSTCODE , INST_STATE , INST_COUNTRY , INST_CNT_NAME , INST_CNT_NRIC , INST_CNT_EMAIL , INST_CNT_TEL_M , INST_CNT_TEL_O , INST_CNT_TEL_R , INST_CNT_TEL_F , INST_CNT_GENDER , FIRST_INSTALL_NO , FIRST_INSTALL_CT_CODE , FIRST_INSTALL_CT_NAME , FIRST_INSTALL_DT , FIRST_INSTALL_REM , FIRST_INSTALL_SIRIM_NO , FIRST_INSTALL_SERIAL_NO , LAST_INSTALL_NO , LAST_INSTALL_CT_CODE , LAST_INSTALL_CT_NAME , LAST_INSTALL_DT , LAST_INSTALL_REM , LAST_INSTALL_SIRIM_NO , LAST_INSTALL_SERIAL_NO , DSC_ID , DSC_CODE , DSC_NAME , INSTCT , PREFER_INST_DT , PREFER_INST_TM , INSTALL_ADDR_ID , INSTALL_CNTC_ID , INST_CNT_DEPT , INST_CNT_POST , VRIFY_REM FROM SAL1010V_V2 WHERE ORD_ID = #{salesOrdId}

SELECT ORD_ID, ORD_NO, APP_TYPE_CODE, STOCK_CODE, STOCK_DESC, CONFIG_BS_GEN, SRV_MEM_FREQ, MEM_ID, MEM_CODE, NAME, SETL_DT, CONFIG_BS_REM, CONFIG_SETT_AS, CONFIG_SETT_BS, CONFIG_SETT_INS, CONFIG_BS_WEEK, CUST_NAME, CUST_NRIC, CONFIG_ID FROM ( SELECT V.ORD_ID, V.ORD_NO, V.APP_TYPE_CODE, V.STOCK_CODE, V.STOCK_DESC, VS.CONFIG_BS_GEN, VS.SRV_MEM_FREQ, M.MEM_ID, M.MEM_CODE, M.NAME, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(R.SETL_DT),'DD/MM/YYYY') SETL_DT, VS.CONFIG_BS_REM, VS.CONFIG_SETT_AS, VS.CONFIG_SETT_BS, VS.CONFIG_SETT_INS, VS.CONFIG_BS_WEEK, VS.CONFIG_ID, V.CUST_NAME, V.CUST_NRIC FROM SAL1006V V LEFT JOIN SAL1014V VS ON V.ORD_ID = VS.ORD_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0001D M ON VS.CONFIG_BS_MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID LEFT JOIN SVC0006D R ON V.ORD_ID = R.SALES_ORD_ID AND R.RESULT_STUS_CODE_ID = 4 WHERE V.ORD_ID = #{salesOrdId} ORDER BY R.SETL_DT DESC ) X WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT MEM_CODE CODE_ID, MEM_CODE || '-' || NAME CODE_NAME FROM ORG0001D WHERE (MEM_TYPE = 2 OR MEM_TYPE = 3) AND STUS = 1 ORDER BY MEM_CODE
